sentences.sContent: Financial plutocracy must give way to financial democracy – banking as if people mattered.
sentences.sContent_eng: Financial plutocracy must give way to financial democracy – banking as if people mattered.
sentences.sCn: 金融富豪必须让位于金融民主-人民做主的金融。

sentences.sContent: If only millionaires can afford to run for office, we shall quickly become a plutocracy.
sentences.sContent_eng: If only millionaires can afford to run for office, we shall quickly become a plutocracy.
sentences.sCn: 如果只有大富豪才负担得起公职的竞选，我们将很快变成富豪政治。

words.tran: 富豪的；财阀的；有钱有势的

trans.tranOther: a ruling class or government that consists of rich people, or a country that is governed by rich people
